Settings

  • Storage Mode

    Stored data is only available to STCentral-Hub. No other sites can access it.

    The data is not cached or saved anywhere outside your browser.

    Local Storage

    Any data entered will persist indefinitely, or until you clear your browsers history/cache.

    Session Storage

    Any data entered will persist until you close your browser tab, or the browser window when using private mode.

Privacy Policy & Data Collection

This site does not collect or track any data outside of what is tracked by GitHub Pages.

When a GitHub Pages site is visited, the visitor's IP address is logged and stored for security purposes, regardless of whether the visitor has signed into GitHub or not. For more information about GitHub's security practices, see GitHub Privacy Statement.
